source.name: checking the mode
source.instructions: In the given code, what is the purpose of checking the mode of the `moon_image`?

answers.answer: To determine the size of the image
To check if the image has a transparent background
To identify the position of the image

source.guidance: The purpose of checking the mode of the `moon_image` is to determine if the image has a transparent background. The code checks for the modes 'RGBA', 'LA', or 'P' with 'transparency' in the image information. If the image has a transparent background, the `paste()` function uses the `moon_image` as a mask to preserve transparency when overlaying it on the night sky image.
